name: U.C.U - Ultimate Combat Universe (Canceled)
blurb: U.C.U is a collectible cards experience sure to catapult gamers of all ages into a magical world, meeting their wildest expectations!

rewards.reward: 2 Bronze Card Packs, 1 Silver Card Packs, 1 Gold Card Packs, 1 Platinum Card Packs in the FINAL VERSION of the game. + Access to a closed beta where you can play the unfinished game with free access to all cards so that you can help us improve it!\r\n\r\nThe Beta will be released in 10 months!
2 Platinum Card Packs, 2 Gold Card Packs, 1 Silver Card Packs in the FINAL VERSION of the game. + Thanks in game credits + The Above Awards!

4  Platinum Card Packs, 3 Gold Card Packs, 1 Silver Card Packs in the FINAL VERSION of the game. + PDF instruction manual, cards list, tips and more. + The Above Awards!\r\n\r\nPDF, Posters, Artwork, Book, T-Shirt, etc will be delivered around the end of 2012, according to how many we need to deliver!

Darkness Deck in the FINAL VERSION of the game. + Poster  + Exclusive access to sections of the private forum with the possibility of including suggestions in the "co-creation" section, at the end of each month the top 3 suggestions will receive additional benefits in the final version of the game. + The Above Awards!\r\n\r\nPDF, Posters, Artwork, Book, T-Shirt, etc will be delivered around the end of 2012, according to how many we need to deliver!

Lightness deck in the FINAL VERSION of the game + Access to a closed Alpha version of the game, a full month before the release of the Beta version + PDF exclusive artwork of the game.  + The Above Awards!\r\n\r\nPDF, Posters, Artwork, Book, T-Shirt, etc will be delivered around the end of 2012, according to how many we need to deliver!

Personalized poster on canvas ( Pick your favorite Character we will make a poster, your name will be printed on  the bottom part of the Poster and it will be exclusively signed by our team) + The Above Awards!\r\n\r\nPDF, Posters, Artwork, Book, T-Shirt, etc will be delivered around the end of 2012, according to how many we need to deliver!

Silver pen with our logo + limited edition t-shirt with game logo and your account name on the back.  + The Above Awards!\r\n\r\nPDF, Posters, Artwork, Book, T-Shirt, etc will be delivered around the end of 2012, according to how many we need to deliver!

Very special thanks in the game credits + Limited Hardcover Book (artwork, story mode, backstage) signed by the team and numbered by hand.  + The Above Awards!\r\n\r\nPDF, Posters, Artwork, Book, T-Shirt, etc will be delivered around the end of 2012, according to how many we need to deliver!
15 cm (6 inch) plastic statue of Vurg + The Above Awards!\r\n\r\nPDF, Posters, Artwork, Book, T-Shirt, etc will be delivered around the end of 2012, according to how many we need to deliver!

Draw your own personal arena . +  draw your personal card. + The Above Awards!\r\n\r\nPDF, Posters, Artwork, Book, T-Shirt, etc will be delivered around the end of 2012, according to how many we need to deliver!

A 30cm (11.8 in) statue of a card with the character of your preference, fully enclosed in a glass, lit structure. Updates as to the aspect of these statues will be delivered within the kickstarter 35-day period + 4 digital copies of ALL  future upcoming games from BET (already under development and you will be updated as to the status of their progress). + The Above Awards!\r\n\r\nPDF, Posters, Artwork, Book, T-Shirt, etc will be delivered around the end of 2012, according to how many we need to deliver!

These 2 backers will become part of the BET family: behind the scenes updates, preferential access to FREE BETA AND ALPHA versions for ALL future games and direct involvement in the development phases of the games + one 120cm x 80cm (47inch x 31inch)  neon-lit sign representing the U.C.U logo as portrayed on the kickstarter game profile, to light your environment! + The Above Awards!



PDF, Posters, Artwork, Book, T-Shirt, etc will be delivered around the end of 2012, according to how many we need to deliver!
